nodes.text: Simoom was a planet located in the Simoom system, within the Senex sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim, that was homeworld of the Simoomian sensory hound.
Simoom was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed it in grid square L-18.
In the real world, a simoom is a hot, dry, dusty wind in the desert.
